channel.title: WorldLoader/LandscapeLoader?
channel.description:
Okay, I was just wondering if anyone knew where the "WorldLoader" class is in the client. Err, maybe my terminology isn't correct. What class handles the rendering of the current region/world map and the default objects? Such as the Lumbridge castle, Draynor manor, Runecrafting altars, etc.
Also, I can't remember, but what class in the file system contains the map information?
Any information on what class loads it, or any information that may be useful would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: WorldLoader/LandscapeLoader?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:

Okay, I was just wondering if anyone knew where the “WorldLoader” class is in the client. Err, maybe my terminology isn’t correct. What class handles the rendering of the current region/world map and the default objects? Such as the Lumbridge castle, Draynor manor, Runecrafting altars, etc.
